v8:item.v8:content: Deletion of marked objects can take a long time (from few seconds up to several hours depending on a volume of data to be deleted).<1/> When the data is deleted, users (%1) can face the system efficiency reduction. We recommend that you delete marked objects in the periods of the least user activity.
Select check boxes of the objects to be deleted

Deletion is not required. There are no objects marked for deletion.

Reasons why the object cannot be deleted
To delete objects, mark for deletion all associated objects (in the "Usage instances" list) or clear (replace) their references in the associated objects.
